      • voteOnPoll

        void voteOnPoll(int pollId,
              int optionId,
              int userId,
              String ipAddress)
        Increments the vote count on the poll for the given poll id and option id
        Parameters:
        pollId - the poll id that the vote is for
        optionId - the option that was selected for the poll
        userId - int
        ipAddress - String

      • hasUserVotedOnPoll

        boolean hasUserVotedOnPoll(int pollId,
                         int userId)
        Tells if the user has already voted on the given poll
        Parameters:
        pollId - the poll id that is being checked
        userId - the user id to check the vote for
        Returns:
        true if the user has already voted on the given poll

      • hasUserVotedOnPoll

        boolean hasUserVotedOnPoll(int pollId,
                         String ipAddress)
        Tells if any user has already voted on the given poll from the given IP
        Parameters:
        pollId - the poll id that is being checked
        ipAddress - the IP address of the user to check the vote for
        Returns:
        true if the user has already voted on the given poll
